MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have arrived onsite and confirmed an underground cable fault on North Orchard Street. We have commenced repairs however the repairs are taking longer than expected and we now expect your supply to be restored by 12am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:55PM on Thursday 31 December 2020.
